content:
I’m a PhD student in psychology at the University of Gothenburg, specializing in cognitive psychology and cognitive neuroscience. I’m also a proud member of the Lövdén Lab.
My current research focuses on the relationship between dopamine and memory in aging, as well as on lifespan influences on cognitive ability. For more information, see my CV.
summary: I’m a PhD student in psychology at the University of Gothenburg, specializing in cognitive psychology and cognitive neuroscience. I’m also a proud member of the Lövdén Lab.
